title: Mystery Perma Champ shard gone?
body: So after playing several games I finally leveled up and had enough to purchase a mystery perma champ shard, and to my dismay I could no longer find the random perma champ blue essence token anywhere! Does anyone know if it's a glitch or if they've actually removed it? {{summoner:3}}  not pleased especially since earning blue essence is a long and boring process.

replies.body:
The Mystery Champion token has actually been removed from the store. :/

It was part of the Essence Emporium going on, which ended a day or so ago. There's a chance it could pop up again, but I don't have an exact date or if it'll be around for another Essence Emporium. :x
Wow that's sucks I just got enough to buy one and it disappeared on me lol
